feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Integration with SuccessFactors lms table and ui5 Application
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

My requirement is to create simple ui5 application to record external training events and the record should be saved to SuccessFactors lms table through the Api call,
i have developed the ui and called the Api but not able to save the data in the lms table, Im using btp environment and trying to setup the destination configuration but not sure what the missing part, I'm Not having much exposure in btp , so currently stuck here, I have bought our sf url and token service url from sf team, do i need any additional info from them ? is there anything to do to consume the configured destination to access with in the business application studio

  var oPayload = {
                "learningEventRecords": [
                    {
                        "learningEvent": {
                            "title": sTitle,
                            "description": sDescription,
                            "completionDate": sCompletionDate, // format YYYY-MM-DD or as required
                            "totalHours": fTotalHours,
                            "creditHours": fCreditHours,
                            "provider": sProvider,
                            "format": sFormat,
                            "category": sCategory
                            // Add other required fields here
                        }
                    }
                ]
            };

            // API URL - replace with your actual endpoint URL
            var sUrl = "SF_Learning_API/learning/odatav4/public/user/learningEvent/v1/recordLearningEvents";

            // AJAX POST call
            $.ajax({
                url: sUrl,
                method: "POST",
                contentType: "application/json",
                data: JSON.stringify(oPayload),
                headers: {
                    // Add authorization header if needed, e.g.:
                    // "Authorization": "Bearer " + yourAccessToken
                },
                success: function (oData, textStatus, jqXHR) {
                    sap.m.MessageToast.show("Learning event recorded successfully!");
                },
                error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                    sap.m.MessageBox.error("Error recording learning event: " + jqXHR.responseText);
                }
            });

entry.title: Adaptation Project for Post Outgoing Payment (F1612)
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'm working on an adaptation project for the "Post Outgoing Payments" (F1612) Fiori app. The adaptation project works fine in Preview and in the Adaptation Editor, but after deployment, launching the app shows a blank page.

Here‚Äôs the error shown in the browser console:
Uncaught (in promise) Unknown consumer of clearing library: <my namespace>
I haven‚Äôt made any modifications‚Äîjust created the adaptation project and deployed it as-is. I expected it to load like the default app, but instead, I‚Äôm getting this blank screen.

For context, I'm using VS Code and have tried both the @SAP-ux/generator-adp and @SAP/generator-adaptation-project to generate the project. The result is the same in both cases.

Has anyone experienced something similar? Is there a workaround or specific configuration required to enable adaptation for this app?

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Smart table causes Fiori app not to load
entry.content:
I have tried adding a smart table on my new custom fiori app. However, after adding it, the app now does not load.

 

<mvc:View controllerName="test.controller.MainView"
xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
xmlns:smartTable="sap.ui.comp.smarttable"
xmlns="sap.m"
xmlns:uc="sap.ui.unified">

<Page>
 <Panel headerText="Table">
  <smartTable:SmartTable id="smartTable">
   <Table>
    <Columns>
     <Column>
      <Text text="Test results"/>
     </Column>
    </Columns>
  </Table>
 </smartTable>
</Page>

Any tips on debugging this kind of error?

entry.title: SD Flexible Workflow
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am currently working on a Flexible Workflow scenario for Sales Orders (SD) and I have a few questions:

  1. Sequential Approval Process

    • The business requirement is that one sales order should go through multiple approvals step by step ( Regional Approval ‚Üí Finance Approval ‚Üí Operations Approval ‚Üí Final Approval).

    • If one approver rejects, the workflow should return back to the previous approver.

    • Is it possible to design this end-to-end approval chain within one workflow definition in Flexible Workflow, or do we need to trigger separate workflows one after another?

  2. Approval Visibility (Who Approved / Who is Pending)

    • Business users want to see clearly who already approved and whose approval is still pending for the same document.

    • Which Fiori app(s) or logs can provide this information? (My Inbox log, Workflow Instances, etc.)

  3. Approver Screen ‚Äì Header vs. Item Details

    • Currently, in My Inbox, the approver only sees the header information of the sales order.

    •  

       

      • Is there a way to also display item-level details (line items) for better decision making?

      • Do we need to enhance the Flexible Workflow task UI with a custom extension?

  4. Navigation to VA03

    • When an approver opens the approval task in My Inbox, is it possible to provide a navigation option that directly opens the corresponding sales order in VA03 (Display Sales Order) in SAP GUI or via Fiori?

    • If yes, how can we configure or enhance the task to trigger this navigation?

Any guidance or best practices would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Flexible workflow approver of Lean service sheet based network (account assignment category N)
entry.content:
Dear Community,

is it possible to determine the proper approver of a Lean Service Entry Sheet based on the Network (Account Assignment Category = N) in Fiori Flexible workflow ?

Based on project "P" this kind of possibilities exist.
Any guidance based on SAP standard solution?
System: on-premise S/4H 2023

Many thanks in advanceüëç

entry.title: How to Hide a Combined Field Group (#AS_FIELDGROUP) by Default in a Fiori Elements List Report
entry.content:
I‚Äôm working on a CDS view where we use the #AS_FIELDGROUP annotation to display a combined field called ‚ÄúPlanned Start / End‚Äù.

 @ui: {
  lineItem: [
  {  hidden: true
  },
      { 
      type: #AS_FIELDGROUP,
        valueQualifier: 'StartEnd',
        label: 'Planned Start / End',
        importance: #LOW
         }
  ],
      fieldGroup: [
      {
      exclude: true,
      qualifier: 'StartEnd',
        position: 10 }]
  }
  @Consumption:{
      filter.hidden: true
       }
       
  MfgOrderPlannedStartEndDate;
    @ui: {
    lineItem: [
    { hidden: true }
    ],
    fieldGroup: [
    {
    qualifier: 'StartEnd',
      position: 20 }] }
  @Consumption:{
    filter.hidden: true
     }
  MfgOrderPlannedEndStartDate;

At the moment, this field is shown by default in the list report, but I‚Äôd like it not to appear by default, while still allowing users to add it manually via Adapt UI (table personalization). I tried using exclude: true, but it didn‚Äôt work as expected.

Do you know if there‚Äôs a way to achieve this behavior? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Program not working in Fiori but working in GUI
entry.content:
I have a custom report in SAP which is fetching data based on the selection screen input from vbak table and displaying as ALV. It is working as expected in SAP gui. But when executed on the fiori app with the same inputs, it is not giving any output.  The program contains simple select queries and loops to process data for Sales OTC flow.

Please help!!!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP Fiori transaction access log report‚Äìhow to track user activity (custom "Fiorized" applications)?
entry.content:
I‚Äôm looking for guidance on how to access user access logs specifically for SAP GUI transactions that have been migrated to Fiori apps (custom "Fiorized" applications). My goal is to generate a report or view that shows which users are accessing these Fiorized apps (custom "Fiorized" applications), including details such as:

  • User ID
    Timestamp of access
    Application name or technical ID
    Device or browser info (if available)


I‚Äôm not referring to standard SAP Fiori apps, but rather to custom applications that were originally SAP GUI transactions and have been redesigned or wrapped into Fiori interfaces.

Is there a recommended way to track this kind of usage?

Any help or direction would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: App Extensibility: Manage Work Permits (Key User)
entry.content:
I am trying to add a custom field to Fiori App Manage Work Permits as per https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_ON-PREMISE/e72f747389b340229f7fa343975bfa57/196c1b7dadf1475fb9787683f42032ed.html
I have added the new field under Custom Fields and Logic App under Business Context EAMS_WORK_PERMIT, and it appears in User Interfaces tab under CDS view R_WORKPERMITTP where I have enabled and then published it.
However the new field still doesn't appear in Manage Work Permits app for key user adaptation?

entry.title: F2027: Manage Service Entry Sheets - PO reference dialog extension
entry.content:
Hi Experts!
I would like to ask, if it is possible to extend/change logic of displaying PO items in dialog box that appears after adding reference PO to the field and pressing ENTER.

I the list above, I would like to limit displaying items based on some conditions (deleted, blocked, limited..).
The CDS service of this app is not extensible. 
Adaptation project in BAS does not show extension:

Only adaptation editor can be opened, BUT the dialog is not extensible there either, as you can see, adapt UI is active, but only object behind the dialog are adaptable.

I have checked the BSP application, there are some extensibilities, and the one that I need, but as I can not see them in the BAS, is it even possible to implement custom logic to them? In my case I would need to work with SelectionDialogPO.fragment.xml  and controller for adding logic ListReportExtension.controller.js.


But, as the CDS are not extensible, I do not know.

Please help me find a correct solution.
Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
Veronika

entry.title: Smart table does not show CDS view results
entry.content:
I was trying to display the sales document number on my Smart Table using CDS views. However, it only shows blank. What are wrong with my code?

<smartTable:SmartTable
  id="Results"
  enableAutoBinding="true"
  editable="false"
>
<Table items="{/ZSD_C_SDOC}">
<columns>
 <Column>
  <Text text="Sales Document"/>
 </Column>
</columns>
<items>
 <ColumnListItem>
  <cells>
   <Text text="{SalesDocNo}"/>
  </cells>
 </ColumnListItem>
</items>
</Table>
</smartTable:SmartTable>

 

@odata.publish: true
@EndUserText.label: 'Test CDS View'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true

define root view ZSD_C_SDOC as select from vbak
{
 key vbeln as SalesDocNo
}

entry.title: Date Time as a Custom Filter Field
entry.content:
Hi 
I am designing an CAP Based Fiori application , In my List Report Page I have some Filters startDateTIme and endDateTime , which accept the dateTime datatype with multiple condition operator , where the values of theses filters are in current local timezone  , but before sending the data to backend they convert into UTC . My query is that is there any way we can make the value of filter to UTC timezone by default instead of converting it from the client side  , or Is there any way to Intecept the GET call so that I can manually convert it to local to UTC of the same values .
Any Help is most welcome 
Thank You .

SalesDocument_01000000125

In my cds: it is declared that 

key vbak.vbeln  as SalesDocument

XML
<smartTable:SmartTable>
 <Table items="{Z_VBAKTEST}">
  <columns>
   <Column>
    <Text text="Sales Document No">
   <Column>
  </columns>
  <items>
   <ColumnListItem>
    <Text text="{SalesDocument}"/>
   <ColumnListItem>
  </items>
 </Table>
</smartTable:SmartTable>

entry.title: F0797 Manage Billing Document Fiori App Extension - Custom Button
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

SAP S/4 HANA 2023 Private Cloud...
I have a requirement to add a custom button to the Manage Billing Documents Fiori App. The custom button is to apply a mass change to the select records within the application. What is the preferred approach for creating this extension? I realized that I was not able to create a behavior extension for this app which would have been preferred. 

Is the only approach UI5 Development extension and add a custom fragment to the app?

Thanks,
Jared

entry.title: Navigation Issue in CAP UI5 Apps on BTP CF Fiori Launchpad After Page Refresh
entry.content:
Hi all,

We are building several CAP-based UI5 applications deployed on BTP Cloud Foundry.

When these applications run inside the Fiori Launchpad (FLP), we encounter a navigation issue: if a user refreshes the page explicitly, they are unable to navigate back using either the browser‚Äôs back button or the Launchpad‚Äôs NavBack button (next to the SAP home icon). Initially, the user remains stuck on the current page (the browser hash doesn‚Äôt change either). After a few clicks, they are suddenly redirected straight to the FLP home page.

There are no errors/warnings/info in the browser's console log.

This issue does not occur when the same UI5 apps are run in standalone mode (accessed via the HTML5 Applications tab in the BTP Cockpit), nor does it affect Fiori Elements apps running in FLP.

Here‚Äôs how we handle navigation and routing in our UI5 app view controllers (TypeScript):

Navigating Forward

// params are routing parameters such as mandatory parameter
public navToView(viewName: string, params?: object): void {
    this.getRouter().navTo(viewName, params ? params : {});
}

Example usage:

public onNavToNextView(): void {
    this.navToView("nextView");
}

We even added a nav back button, but it has the same problem as well.

Navigating Back

// same, params is just an obj for routing parameters
public navBackToView(viewName: string, params?: object): void {
    const history = History.getInstance();
    const previousHash = history.getPreviousHash();

    if (previousHash !== undefined) {
        window.history.go(-1);
    } else {
        this.getRouter().navTo(viewName, params ? params : {}, true);
    }
}

Example usage:

// press event for nav back button
public onNavBack(): void {
    this.navBackToView("previousView");
}

This is how we initialise the router in the Component.ts file:

this.getRouter().initialize();

This is the routing configuration in the manifest.json file:

"routing": {
      "config": {
        "routerClass": "sap.m.routing.Router",
        "controlAggregation": "pages",
        "controlId": "app",
        "transition": "slide",
        "type": "View",
        "viewType": "XML",
        "path": "myapp.view",
        "async": true,
        "bypassed": {
          "target": "notFound"
        }
      },
      "routes": [
        {
          "name": "RouteHome",
          "pattern": ":?query:",
          "target": ["TargetHome"]
        },
        {
          "pattern": "login",
          "name": "login",
          "target": "login"
        }
      ],
      "targets": {
        "TargetHome": {
          "id": "Home",
          "name": "Home",
          "level": 1
        },
        "login": {
          "viewName": "Login",
          "viewId": "login",
          "level": 1
        },
        "notFound": {
          "id": "notFound",
          "name": "NotFound",
          "transition": "show"
        }
      }
    }

 

Are we missing something in our implementation? We‚Äôve followed UI5 examples from the Demo Kit. Could this be a known or unknown issue/bug with FLP itself?

Any insights or suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you.

entry.title: Setting Default Values in Create-Dialog
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm relatively new to the topic of SAPUI5 and Fiori development.

My first litlle project is creating an app variant of  a Fiori standard app (F5241). I wanted to implement these requirements via an Fiori Adaptation Project. It should contain less fields on the Object Page and the fields "Order Type", "Planning Plant" and "Main Work Center" should have default values that are not editable for the users. Because of the fields "Order Type" and "Planning Plant" already being set in the Create-Dialog, I want to know if you have any solutions to set a default value for fields in this Create-Dialog. 

 

I would be very thankful if you can help me with that. Thank!

Best regards,

Max

entry.title: How to prevent developer to import transports through Charm
entry.content:
Hi Team, 

How to prevent developer to import transports through Charm. we dont have a consistency check with SAME_USER on status imported into production.

is there any alternative to make this as hard stop, if the same user (who created NC and who is a developer) is importing into production using Normal change or Urgent change docs

Thanks,

Fakruddeen Shaik

entry.title: VA01/VA02 Fiori App (Webgui) - Empty space between Header and Position
entry.content:
Hallo Community,

In Our S/4 Hana on Premise. We have The Standard WebGui Apps for VA01/VA02 in Fiori Launchpad . (see attachement)

We have the Problem. that between Header and Positions there is an empty space in the WebGui/ Fiori Version.

Is there any idea or Note, how we can remove it?

Thanks and Regards

ChG
